title: "Kinder, gentler robotic arm channels its inner elephant and octopus"
excerpt: "In order to function safely alongside human workers, robotic arms shouldn't be hard and unyielding. An experimental new arm was designed with that fact in mind, as it mimics soft n' squishy elephant trunks and octopus tentacles."
